trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Romeo
There were no other sightings in Romeo on or around August 17th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi wanted to show my daughter the shuttle in orbit, since we had watched the launch on tv, and she was interested by it. so i had looked up on the internet when it would be visible here, which was for 2 minutes at 9:56 from nnw to e. at 9:54 we paused our movie and the whole family went out to see it. mother in law, wife, 2 daughters and myself. right on que, it appeared and before it was halfway over my mother in law saw the trailing red light and said whats that? then my wife saw it and then i, my daughters did not. it was a small point of red light following the shuttle\iss but kind of dancing like a laser pointer to a cat. i had no explanation as to what the light could be, and we were all very puzzled by it. the next good sighting is sunday night. we will be back out.
Summary: while observing the Space station w/ docked shuttle fly over , we observed small red point of light trailing behind . the light moved up and down and went backwards at one point but generally stayed behind the ISS.
